general_advisory: Provide light irrigation to paddy nursery. Keep provision of critical irrigation for rabi crops. Survey for insect pest attack and take necessary steps. Complete earthing up in rabi crops. Due to weather there is chances of powdery mildew in various crops, to manage spray sulphur powder @ 1 kg in 200 liters of water.

advisory: When the seedlings are with 4 -5 leaves, go for transplanting the paddy seedling. Transplant 2 -3 seedling per hill and in line with shallow depth for quick establishment of the seedling.
Provide critical stage irrigation to the crop. Survey for any insect.
This is right time for sowing of maize. Without delay sow @ 6 kg per acre. Apply 10 kg Chlorpyriphos per acre in termite prone area. Spacing is 60 X 25 cm with 5 cm depth in soil.
Due to weather there is chances of fruit borer attack, to manage this spray Chlorpyriphos @ 2 ml per liter of water.
Due to weather there is chances of Early blight in potato, to manage spray Mancozeb @ 4 g per liter of water.
Start sowing sesamum @ 3 kg seed per acre. Choose varieties like Smarak, Kalika, G10, Subhra.
Go for intercultivation at 21 days after sowing the crop. Do not disturb the soil after the peg formation stage.
Transplant the 3 weeks old seedling at spacing of 20 X 10 cm.
Light intercultivation are to be done since the roots will be shallow and found in surface of the soil.
Provide the feed mixture according to the body weight.
